content.first: Our mission is to create a more productive and fairer world.
content.second: Trillions of dollars of real assets (e.g., houses, ships, machinery) are stuck in illiquid non-transparent markets.  If we can’t understand the real assets that drive the world’s economy it is likely they are not fully productive. If many cannot access real asset ownership it is likely we create greater inequality.
content.third: We believe we can do it by holding a single asset in a single company. Each company gives its asset an identity through which we can better understand it, a framework of governance to own and operate it and through shares, the ability to effectively change ownership.
content.fourth: The issue with companies is that they are expensive and difficult to manage. And on their own, they do not necessarily create trust. This is what we are solving. Make companies cheap and easy to use. Create a platform that builds trust.
content.fifth: We are starting with the residential buy-to-let sector in the UK. There is £1.3 trillion of stock in this market. A huge business. But ironically nearly all of it is in personal rather than company ownership.
content.sixth: Come join us create a more productive and fairer world.

content.second: Alternatively you can contact us for more information or to remove your data from our system.

additionalServices.title: Additional services
additionalServices.introBox: Through our partners we can provide seamless access to the best services for all your property needs. Select below which ones you’d like help with.

additionalServices.modalPara2: Our office is open from 9am to 6pm London time, Monday to Friday, and we usually respond within the hour.
additionalServices.modalPara3: However, out of working hours it might take us longer to get back to you, but we’ll always do so as soon as possible, please bare with us.

advantages.title: GetGround Advantages
advantages.warning: None of the information contained here, nor anywhere in this presentation contributes advice

tax.title: UK TAX ADVANTAGES
tax.info1: When you buy investment property that you rent out, there is no difference in stamp duty and land tax (SDLT) versus personal ownership.
tax.info2: There is no SDLT when you buy shares, rather than property. Benefit from this if you sell or buy shares of property holding companies on the GetGround marketplace.
tax.info3: Deduct mortgage interest from your tax bill. Under personal ownership this is being phased out and replaced with a basic rate credit.
tax.info4: There is lower capital gains tax on a sale of shares, rather than property.
tax.info5: Choose multiple ways to take money from your company e.g., capital repayments or dividends (utilise your tax-free dividend allowance; non-UK residents do not pay dividend tax).

left.info2: Deduct mortgage interest from your UK tax bill
left.info4: Save on stamp duty and land tax (SDLT) when you sell
left.info5: Efficiently take income from your property

feed1.info2: Replaced with a basic rate credit
feed1.info5: Either income tax or capital gains tax

feed2.info1: same taxes (e.g SDLT) as personal ownership if you rent out your property to 3rd parties
feed2.info3: 10% or 20% CGT tax for sale of shares
feed2.info5: Choose between capital repayments or dividends

company.title: ADDITIONAL COMPANY ADVANTAGES
company.info1: Purchase easily with friends, family and business partners.
company.info2: Contain your liabilities in the company. If your investment goes wrong your personal wealth is safer.
company.info3: Using a company could mean you get a bigger mortgage. It could also mean banks have lower income requirements for you.

left.info4: Reduce your income requirements from mortgage lenders

feed1.info1: Max 4 people on a title deed & no governance agreements

feed2.info1: Unlimited owners protected by governance agreements
feed2.info2: Contain your liabilities in the company as a separate legal entity
feed2.info3: Potentially easier bank tests (rental income vs. interest expense)
feed2.info4: Typically banks require a combined shareholder income of £25k p.a.

companyComplete.title: Well done!
companyComplete.copy: We have all the details we need to set up your company.
companyComplete.info: Your shareholders will receive an email to set up their account on GetGround. We will have to wait for them to sign up before being able to draft your company’s documents. In order to speed up the process you might want to encourage them to sign up as soon as possible.

intro.para2: This is a six step process and it can take you as little as 20 minutes.
intro.para3: If you need a solicitor, a mortgage, insurance or property management services, GetGround can refer you to them.

moreInfo.info1: GetGround services are for investors of residential property that will be rented out. The property must be in England and Wales.
moreInfo.info2: All GetGround companies are UK Limited companies.
moreInfo.info3: Each GetGround company only ever holds one property. This means:
moreInfo.info4: You are better protected as each asset’s liability is contained in a separate company.
moreInfo.info5: You can easily buy or sell a property just by changing ownership in the shares of the company holding it.
moreInfo.info6: It can take as little as 20 minutes to own a GetGround company. You just need to sign-up to our platform and we will ask some details about you, your property and who you want to own your company with.
moreInfo.info7: It is easy to manage your company through the GetGround website. Everything you need in one place.
moreInfo.info8: You should engage GetGround before exchange of your property contracts.

step1.title: Step 1
step1.copy: GetGround will set up a UK Limited company and bank account for you

step2.title: Step 2
step2.copy: GetGround can connect you to mortgages, insurance, property management and solicitors (optional service)

step3.title: Step 3
step3.copy: GetGround will coordinate with your lawyers to purchase your property through your company

step4.title: Step 4
step4.copy: GetGround will manage on an on-going basis all your company requirements including accounting, tax, legal documents, filings and secretarial work

step5.title: Step 5
step5.copy: GetGround can connect you to other investors on the platform to buy and sell shares in companies holding property (optional service)

landing.title: GetGround for smarter property purchasing.
landing.secondaryTitle: Protect your wealth and be tax efficient.
landing.firstParagraph: GetGround makes it easy and affordable to purchase investment property the smarter way – through a company.
landing.secondParagraph: By using our platform you better protect your personal wealth, drive tax efficiency and create more flexibility in how you buy, manage and sell your property.
landing.thirdParagraph: GetGround sets up your company that purchases your investment property. We manage all your company’s on-going needs under one roof.

content.first: Moubin has experience in investing, commercial strategy, tax and structuring. He was an investment professional at Apax Partners, one of the world’s leading private equity houses.
content.second: There he was involved in numerous key transaction in the retail, consumer and IT services sectors. Previously Moubin was at McKinsey & Company and is trained as a medical doctor at Imperial College where he graduated with distinctions.

content.first: Misrab is a computer scientist. He set up the data science team and Singapore office at Go-Jek, Indonesia’s first technology ‘unicorn’.
content.second: There he was involved in numerous key transaction in the retail, consumer and IT services sectors. Previously Moubin was at McKinsey & Company and is trained as a medical doctor at Imperial College where he graduated with distinctions.
content.third: Misrab is a Stanford University graduate with Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees focused around computer science, economics and mathematics.

label.optIn: I would like to receive news and updates from GetGround
label.privacyOne: Creating an account means you accept our

slides.title: Get started
slides.copy:
You’ll create your account in 3 simple steps.

You’ll need your passport and a proof of address at hand.

You can then access your dashboard and start creating companies.

slides.title: Save money
slides.copy:
Owning UK residential investment property in a company can save you money.

With GetGround it has never been cheaper to own and run companies.

slides.title: Save time
slides.copy: We use technology to make setting up and managing a company painless and hassle free.

slides.title: All in one place
slides.copy: Everything your company needs right here at GetGround. Seamless access to other services, such as mortgage and insurance product. Get started now.

confirmation.heading: Well done
confirmation.copy:
Your details have been submitted.

You can now go into your dashboard and start creating your first company.

idCheck.title: ID Check
idCheck.text: To prove your identity we need you to take a picture of your passport, proof of address and take a picture of yourself.
idCheck.link: If you already have it saved, upload instead

passport.name: Passport
passport.title: Add a picture of your passport
passport.content: Please make sure you take a picture of the page of your passport that contains your picture and your details. The full page should be visible on the picture.
passport.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure it is well-lit and that you can read the information clearly.

address.name: Proof of Address
address.title: Add proof of address
address.content: Now we need a picture of a utility bill, bank statement or any government letter (e.g. HMRC). Please make sure the document is recent (within the past 3 months) and the address and your name are clearly visible.
address.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure the date, your full name and address are clearly visible.

selfie.name: Your picture
selfie.title: Take a picture of yourself
selfie.content: We need this picture so we can match it with the one in your passport. This is to make sure no one is trying to create a false account using your documents.
selfie.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure the picture is well-lit and not blurred.

services.title: OPTIONAL SERVICES PRICING
services.firstContent: Our partners may charge a fee if you decide to use their mortgage, insurance, solicitor or property management services.
services.secondContent: We charge 0.2% of the property’s sale value if you buy or sell shares in companies holding property on the GetGround platform. You do not have to sell through us, this is an optional service.

taxQuestions.title: Tax questions
taxQuestions.introBox: The money you provide to purchase your property is lent by you to your company. We create a loan note between yourself and your company for this. This question determines the interest rate we should apply to your loan to the company
taxQuestions.ownership: Do you have ownership or voting rights of 25% or more in any companies, partnerships or other enterprises?
taxQuestions.employ: Do they employ more than 50 employees combined?
taxQuestions.assets: Do they have assets of 10m€ or less combined?
taxQuestions.turnover: Do they have a turnover of 10m€ or less combined?

trustAndPrivacy.title: Trust and Privacy
trustAndPrivacy.subTitle: At GetGround, we take the trust our customers place in us very seriously.

info0.title: You own and control your company
info0.copy: GetGround is a service provider and does not have any directorship or ownership in your company. We cannot perform any activities on your company without your explicit consent.

info1.title: You can leave us at any time
info1.copy: You are free to leave our services at any time without penalty.

info2.title: We work with your lawyers
info2.copy: When you purchase your property through GetGround you continue to use your conveyancing lawyer as per normal. You send your funds to purchase the property directly to your conveyancing lawyer’s client account. As a result, the underlying checks and procedures operating in the market are maintained.

info3.title: Funded by the UK Government
info3.copy: We are funded in part by the Government through HM Land Registry’s Geovation program as well as being funded by other prestigious private investors.

info4.title: FCA regulated
info4.copy: We are regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority and abide to high standards with regard to compliance. We are subject to regular supervision to ensure we meet these standards and treat our customers fairly.

info5.title: Compliance
info5.copy: All GetGround customers need to pass UK approved Know-Your-Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) checks. GetGround is registered with the Information Commissioner’s Office and adheres to UK General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

info6.title: Transparency
info6.copy: We believe transparency is key in establishing trust. All GetGround companies are UK limited companies and as such their details are recorded at Companies House in the UK. This is a public register that anyone is able to check and includes company details, owner and director information and copies of key company documents.

info7.title: We work with industry leaders
info7.copy: GetGround works with the best in the industry. All legal documents for GetGround companies are produced by CMS Cameron McKenna Nabarro OlswangLLP. GetGround is proud to partner with One Global Property Service, RPI Complete, Paradigm Land and numerous others in the residential buy-to-let property sector.

content.first: Through technology GetGround makes it easier and cheaper than ever to own property in a company. We provide all the services your company needs under one roof.
content.second: Our simple website means you no longer have to spend time on the phone or email chasing your company lawyers, accountants, secretaries or banks.
content.third: We’ve have crafted the optimal company structure for UK investment property. Using it means you are likely to pay less tax.
content.fourth: Through our partners we can provide seamless access to the best services for all your property needs; including mortgages, insurance, property management and solicitors.
content.fifth: GetGround customers also have access to the GetGround marketplace making buying and selling shares in companies holding property fast and cost effective.
